sentences.en: A numerical taxonomy of Sphagnum species.
sentences.cn: 泥炭藓植物数量分类的研究.

sentences.en: In the zonal area from 500 to 700 m , plant community is Betula ovilifolia - Carex schmidtii - Sphagnum palustre community.
sentences.cn: 距河流500-700m的带状区域植物群落为油桦-臌囊苔草-泥炭藓群落.

sentences.en: Migh - level peat dominated by Sphagnum residue is an important evidence forpaleodimatic change.
sentences.cn: 以泥炭藓植物残体为主的高位泥炭,是古气候研究的重要佐证.

sentences.en: That water is typically thought to run off into the ocean and contribute to sea level rise, but Loisel thinks the porous sphagnum moss that makes up most peat may be drinking in the excess moisture.
sentences.cn: 通常认为融化产生的水汇入海洋从而造成海平面升高。 但是鲁伊赛却认为，构成泥炭沼泽的渗透性强的泥苔藓也许可以额外吸附大量的水分。

sentences.en: The Novarbo Substrates for professional horticulture are based on sphagnum peat.
sentences.cn: 专业的园艺栽培基质-诺万播,源于优质的泥炭藓资源.

sentences.en: The technique of using finely ground sphagnum moss to prevent damping - off also works well.
sentences.cn: 采用良好的土地泥炭藓来防止幼苗的腐烂的技术同样也有很好的效果.

trans.tran_en: a type of  moss (= simple plant )  that grows in wet places
